name: Snaklops
description:
A very simple puzzle game where you are a snake (…lops) that only has the power of what it eats.  For example, you can only move to the right if you have eaten the power to move to the right.

You can use keyboard arrows or mouse.

This is just a small sample of what the game will be, as I’m still working on it.

This is also still an alpha version so there may be some bugs.

Enjoy!
